verses.roman:
bhāvodaya, bhāva-śānti, sandhi, śābalya
sañcārī, sāttvika, sthāyī svabhāva-prābalya

synonyms: bhāva-udaya—awakening of emotion; bhāva-śānti—emotions of peace; sandhi—the junction of different emotions; śābalya—mixing of all emotions; sañcārī—impetuses for all kinds of emotion; sāttvika—transcendental; sthāyī—prevalent; svabhāva—natural emotion; prābalya—increase.
translation: There was an increase in all the natural emotional symptoms. Thus there were awakening emotions, peacefulness, joined, mixed, transcendental and prevalent emotions, and impetuses for emotion.
